Fall_River.Valentine\u2013French House:
The Valentine–French House is a historic house located at 5105 North Main Street in Fall River, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It built in 1769 on the 13th lot of Freemen's Purchase by William Valentine for his bride, Sybil Winslow. The massive center chimney had six outlets & the fireplace used for cooking is quite large.
